title: Rear Hugger and Chain Guard Moulding - Installation

body.body: Rear Hugger and Chain Guard Moulding - Installation
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
If removed, fit the rear hugger mounting bracket to the swinging arm and tighten its fixing to
Fit the rear hugger and chain guard moulding to the swinging arm and secure with the four fixings. Tighten the fixings to
